body: what a short ch. and they became a couple. >.< lol

Her disgust for him coalesced with her shame for pissing herself and turned into embarrassment, then her embarrassment turned into curiosity due to his confession, eventually her curiosity turned into interest (why? idfk, maybe he's normally a nice guy but was just desperate to get the girl he liked), and then her interest turned into an attraction that sparked a budding romance between the two. How long it took though? The world may never know. That's my interpretation for real world logic but in the hentai world she probably just went from disgust to embarrassment and then skipped right on to interest and attraction, cause fuck it hentai logic trumps everything. Also @nabid I agree, cause so long as it has even the slightest hint of vanilla, I am content.
Wow this guys a piece off shit... why is she dating him at the end agian?
I have no idea what this plot is about other than holding her bladder n shit. nice art tho!
The only vanilla line is "even after that he became my boyfriend. "
